name: screen-reader-speak.js
description: Accessibility for Screen Reader to speak

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); let data = fs.readFileSync('src/screen-reader-speak.js'); data = ';(function(){\n\"use strict\";\n' + data + '}());'; fs.writeFileSync('dist/screen-reader-speak.js', data);" && uglifyjs src/*.js -m -e --webkit -c sequences,dead_code,conditionals,booleans,unused,if_return,join_vars,drop_console,negate_iife=false -o dist/screen-reader-speak.min.js && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); let data = fs.readFileSync('dist/screen-reader-speak.min.js'); data = ';(function(){\"use strict\";' + data + '}());'; fs.writeFileSync('dist/screen-reader-speak.min.js', data);" && npx jest
